Title: Twinspire Keep
Description:
I do not trust this Horde. They wield foul magic, and their intentions are clearly malevolent. We can no longer stand their presence in Twinspire Keep, so close to Paw'don.

I beg you, visitor: thin their numbers before they do something awful to this village.
ObjectivesText: Slay 15 Horde troops in Twinspire Keep.
CompletionText: Gol' dang, but there's a bunch of 'em down there...
RewardText:
One heck of a bloody mess y'made down there, kid.

Nice work.
